item.title: Using an Azure function to get Octopus deployment notifications in Slack
item.description: If you want to be notified in Slack when an Octopus deployment occurs it’s not just as simple as plugging in the Slack webhook url into Octopus. You need to use an intermediary that can translate the Octopus json format into the Slack json format. This post gives a high-level overview of how an Azure function can be used to do this.
